#Phytophthora Transposons

== Example SeqExter project to deduct consensus of abundant transposable elements in Phytophthora cinnamomi using Illumina genomic short reads ==

Source file (input data) Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_SRR097634.HQ.seqs has 10,635,323 (10 million) short Illumina reads. 

Original data, Phytophthora cinnamomi Illumina GA reads, are from the library SRX040426; NCBI GenBank reference [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/SRX040426] (Phytophthora cinnamomi Project)

You can setup and test an example SeqExter project using following steps:

----
*1.* Download three input files from project's home page:
Phytophthora_cinnamomi_IGA_Lib_Set_A.gz
Phytophthora_cinnamomi_IGA_Lib_Set_B.gz
Phytophthora_cinnamomi_IGA_Lib_Set_C.gz

----
*2.* Uncompress files with 'gunzip'

----
*3.* Concatenate three subsets into one file:
{{{
cat Phytophthora_cinnamomi_IGA_Lib_Set_A Phytophthora_cinnamomi_IGA_Lib_Set_B Phytophthora_cinnamomi_IGA_Lib_Set_C > Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_SRR097634.HQ.seqs
}}}

----
*4.* Check number of sequences in Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_SRR097634.HQ.seqs file:
{{{
wc -l Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_SRR097634.HQ.seqs
}}}
(you should get 10635323 lines)

----
*5.* Run SeqExter with following options:
{{{
tclsh8.4 seqexter_2011_03_04_r41.tcl Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_SRR097634.HQ.seqs Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_Z.ATGGCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGG.OUT STRING ATGGCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGG 12000000 75 PROC_01 LOOP_NESTED
}}}

where:

tclsh8.4 seqexter_2011_03_04_r41.tcl - *PROGRAM TO RUN*

Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_SRR097634.HQ.seqs - *INPUT FILE*

Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_Z.ATGGCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGG.OUT - *SET OF OUTPUT FILES*

STRING ATGGCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGG - *FIRST SEARCH STRING (ORIGINAL KEY)*

12000000 - *MAX NUMBER OF SEQUENCES TO LOAD*

75 - *LENGTH OF ANALYZED ALIGNMENT*

PROC_01 LOOP_NESTED - *NESTED SEARCH LOOP*

*system requirements - 64 bit Linux/Unix system with tclsh interpreter; 16 Gb of RAM*

----

Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_Z.ATGGCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGG.OUT.Log

Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_Z.ATGGCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGG.OUT.Search

Phytophthora_cinnamomi_library_Z.ATGGCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGG.OUT.Summary

*10.* Note about selection of the first search key.

For this particular project the first search key was selected based on similarity to known transposon sequence:

{{{
>gb|DQ645741.1|  Phytophthora sojae transposon GypsyPs-2 reverse transcriptase 
gene, partial cds
Length=1446

 Score = 48.1 bits (24),  Expect = 0.002
 Identities = 33/36 (92%), Gaps = 0/36 (0%)
 Strand=Plus/Plus

Query  1   GCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGGGAGT  36
           |||||||||||| || |||||||| |||||||||||
Sbjct  3   GCGTCGAGGTGAAGATGGCGTGTCGACTCCGGGAGT  38
}}}

[http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nucleotide/110294159] was BLAST-ed against Phytophthora cinnamomi library (10,635,323 sequences), and ATGGCGTCGAGGTGACGAAGGCGTGTCAACTCCGG was selected as the key after several trials.
